# Pull Request Templates - Main Page

Thank you for contributing to this project! Please go to the `Preview` tab and click on the link to the appropriate
pull request template. If you don't see your PR type listed, please create a new issue to request a new template. For
any other information/support, please contact us on our Discord server in the #developing channel.

If you're looking for ideas on how to contribute healthily, check out
our [Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)!

## Are you...

### Common Pull Requests

- [Fixing a bug?](?expand=1&template=FIX.md)
- [Adding a new feature?](?expand=1&template=FEAT.md)
- [Refactoring code?](?expand=1&template=REFACTOR.md)

### UI & Docs

- [Editing the documentation?](?expand=1&template=DOCUMENTATION.md)
- [Editing the UI?](?expand=1&template=STYLE.md)

### Checks & Fixes

- [Reverting a broken change?](?expand=1&template=REVERT.md)
- [Patching a security vulnerability?](?expand=1&template=SECURITY.md)
- [Adding tests?](?expand=1&template=TEST.md)

### Workflows & Chores

- [Starting a build workflow?](?expand=1&template=BUILD.md)
- [Starting a CI workflow?](?expand=1&template=CI.md)
- [Updating dependencies or other chores?](?expand=1&template=CHORE.md)
